ðŸ“– Summary: The desktop-tui repository provides a text-based user interface (TUI) desktop environment, functioning similarly to tmux but as a complete desktop replacement. It allows users to run and manage applications within a terminal-based environment, offering features like shortcut configuration, window management, and custom commands.
